p: As meteorological stations were not available in all health districts, Mexico and Brazil organized an improved access to meteorological information and additionally the Mexican Ministry of Health (MoH) provided meteorological stations to the participating district health offices. In parallel efforts in Malaysia, external websites were additionally included to data sets from local meteorological stations [ 19, 20]. The “epidemiological week” (Sunday to Saturday) was set as the temporal unit (annual) for data mapping after excluding weeks 1 and 53 from all datasets due to inconsistent data quality whereas, districts/ municipality were defined as the spatial units. Based on these temporal and spatial units, data collection process used the Excel spreadsheet as a convenient format to consistently store the following sets of variables:
